channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Page View Count
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Page View Count

item.title: CVE-2023-0095|2024-08-02T05:02:43.187Z -- unknown -- page%20view%20count
item.description: The Page View Count WordPress plugin before 2.6.1 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
